attributes.action: Prosecute MPs who have been found guilty of expenses fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should order the Home Secretary to task the police with prosecuting any MP found to have been fraudelently claiming expenses they were not entitled to.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
